    • Class org.Model.Player

      class Player extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • d_cardAssignedForThisTurnFlag
          Boolean d_cardAssignedForThisTurnFlag
          Flag to keep track of if card has been assigned to a Player. Because , it might happen that a player captures two territories in a single turn. But game requires we only provide single. This flag is used to toggle between true and false to keep track of the use case.
        • d_cardsOwnedByPlayer
          List<String> d_cardsOwnedByPlayer
          Keeps a track of the card assigned to player for a particular TURN
        • d_color
          String d_color
          Color assigned to player would be used in rendering the players on Showmap part of the project
        • d_continentsOwned
          List<Continent> d_continentsOwned
          Contains the lsit of the continent captured by Player
        • d_countryCaptured
          List<Country> d_countryCaptured
          Contains the list of the country captured by Player
        • d_moreOrdersFlag
          Boolean d_moreOrdersFlag
          Temporary flag to keep track of the order input for a player in ISSUE ORDER PHASE
        • d_negotiatedPlayers
          List<Player> d_negotiatedPlayers
          List of players the current player has used NEGOTIATE card against. Is useful when doing the ADVANCE operation as this list can be checked for avoiding the advance.
        • d_numOfArmiesRemaining
          Integer d_numOfArmiesRemaining
          Keeps a count of the NUM OF ARMIES
        • d_orderList
          List<Order> d_orderList
          Stored order list , follows COMMAND PATTERN. Executed when the game goes to ORDER EXECUTION PHASE
        • d_playerName
          String d_playerName
          Name of the player
        • d_playerStrategy
          BehaviourStrategy d_playerStrategy
